scripts.test:preview: echo preview test infra is wip
scripts.test:aat: cd sscs-ccd-e2e-tests && yarn install && yarn test:fullfunctional
scripts.test:functional-headless: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --config functional-test/playwright.config.ts --project chromium --reporter=html
scripts.test:functional-head: yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --config functional-test/playwright.config.ts --project chromium --headed --reporter=html
scripts.highLevelDataSetup: echo 'bash bin/before-data-setup-step.sh benefit $1 && ./gradlew highLevelDataSetup --args=$1 && sh bin/after-data-setup-step.sh' > ./temp.sh && sh ./temp.sh
scripts.test:smoke: PLAYWRIGHT_HTML_REPORT=./playwright-report PW_TEST_HTML_REPORT_OPEN=never yarn playwright install && npx playwright test --config functional-test/playwright.config.ts --project chromium --reporter=html
